channel.title: Browsers on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Browsers on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Google Injects Gemini Into Chrome as AI Browsers Go Mainstream
item.description: Google weaving Gemini further into the popular Chrome browser is an inflection point for AI in our software, although some users will still be looking for the “off” switch.

item.title: Google Injects Gemini Into Chrome as AI Browsers Go Mainstream
item.description: Google weaving Gemini further into the popular Chrome browser is an inflection point for AI in our software, although some users will still be looking for the “off” switch.

item.title: Perplexity offers more than twice its total valuation to buy Chrome from Google
item.description: Google may soon be ordered to sell Chrome, and Perplexity is ready.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent Is Haunting My Browser
item.description: New tools from OpenAI and Perplexity can browse the web for you. If the idea takes off, these generative AI agents could turn the internet into a ghost town where only bots roam.
